org.marinemc.util

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.marinemc.util.vectors.Vector3<java.lang.Double>
      • org.marinemc.util.vectors.Vector3d
        • org.marinemc.util.Location
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Location>, org.json.simple.JSONAware, Vector

    public class Location
extends Vector3d
implements org.json.simple.JSONAware, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Location>
    Location class Used for precise positioning (entity location etc)
